text:
Action 13: #COVID19 #Vaccine: Dr. Mandy Hill of @McGovernMed describes what fuels mistrust of the vaccine in the Black community. She said there's a lot of misinformation and lack of diversity among the healthcare providers. 
Here's more with Dr. Hill: https://t.co/BgbGGhcOWL https://t.co/tBSR4i0deu
